summary: Simple file to fix a bug not allowing you to dismiss your followers.
descriptionHtml:
This simple file is a bat file that you may have to use if you cannot dismiss your followers.
Thay may be caused by an old mod that you decided to remove no properly.
What it does, is creating a folder and move the scripts that cause this bug to another folder, so you do not have to make a backup.

IMPORTANT - Put the bat file to your scripts folder, then run it. You scripts folder is located in Data\\Scripts.
If you have issues, reinstall the files; they are located in Scripts\\DumpedScripts.

Enjoy!
